group_1.textRight: *Huff* *Wheeze*...
Good, I won...somehow...
Are you all right?

group_1.textLeft: I was lost in thought... Did I just wander @all the way up here?

group_1.textRight: It really wasn't!

group_1.textLeft: I liked her so much... I really did...
But she gave chocolates to him, not me.@Who could've imagined...

group_1.textRight: (He looks really sad...)
(Is this how miserable you look when someone@doesn't love you back?)
(I don't really get it yet, but...)

group_1.textLeft: I wanted to spend every moment as close to@her as I could...

group_1.textRight: (A place...where you want to be...)
(And he lost it?)
(If that were me, and I lost Mikazuki @Villa...)
(I might feel the same way.)
(Just imagining it makes my chest feel@tight...)
I still don't know very much about love@and romance and stuff...
But, even so...
I think now I understand how you feel,@even if just a little bit.
I'm sorry about what I said earlier...
About how that was an awful reason to kill@yourself!
He really can't hear me, can he? Haha...
Ah, I know! I'll put this in his bag!

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Did something fall out of my bag?
Isn't this stuff for kids? What's it doing@in my bag?!

group_1.textRight: Hehehe...
Sorry, I couldn't give you the chocolates@I bought for Iroha and the others...

group_1.textLeft: Did someone slip this in my bag when@I wasnâ€™t looking?
Maybe they were just being nice, or it could@be some kid from the neighborhood.
Either way, that was nice of them!

group_1.textRight: I'm really glad...
Well, it's time for me to go home.
I hope you can find another place to belong@someday...

group_1.textCenter: (But I can still do quite a bit, I guess.)
(Ai, thank you for setting me free.)
(I'm going to make the most of this place@that Iroha welcomed me into...)
(It looks like it could snow any moment.)
